acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from the City of Petersburg.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Thomas M. Rowlett and Sons conducted business in Petersburg, Virginia and adjoining Nottoway County in the nineteenth century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Thomas M. Rowlett and Sons Ledger, 1871, contains an index and ledger account book.
The index lists customers alphabetically. A note for certain customers indicates what business or location the customer was associated with.

A few ledger entries are included at the back of the volume. The entries document the purchases of individual customers in chronological order and includes the amount owed and paid for purchases. Customers purchased goods such as hogs, eggs, chickens, and butter.
